text: Veljko Stojnić (born 4 February 1999) is a Serbian professional road cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . ==Major results== ;2016 : Junior National Road Championships ::1st 20px Time trial ::2nd Road race ;2017 : Junior National Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial : 2nd Overall Belgrade Trophy Milan Panić : 8th Time trial, UEC European Junior Road Championships : 9th Overall Course de la Paix Juniors ;2018 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Road Championships : 6th Time trial, Mediterranean Games ;2019 : National Road Championships ::2nd Road race ::2nd Time trial ;2020 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Road Championships : 1st 20px Sprints classification UAE Tour : 2nd Overall In the footsteps of the Romans ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Serbian male cyclists
title: Veljko Stojnić
